title: Joint Service Publication
text:
A Joint Service Publication (JSP) is a <a href="United%20Kingdom">United Kingdom</a> <a href="Ministry%20of%20Defence%20%28United%20Kingdom%29">MoD</a> related document.
A JSP is an authoritative set of rules or guidelines with <a href="Defense%20%28military%29">defence</a>-wide applicability or interest. Many are connected with <a href="safety">safety</a> or <a href="engineering">engineering</a> and, as such, are considered important documents for those working in those areas.
Responsible Authority.
As a <a href="library">library</a> of publications, JSPs are not the responsibility of any one person or organisation and over the years this has resulted in an unstructured group of publications many of which have become out of date.
Future Development.
